body_html:
@RichGit101 thanks for your comment.
Deprecating cuda capability 3.0 is more than for binary size. 3.0 misses some cuda instructions that we heavily rely on, for example __shfl.
Compiling PyTorch from source for CC3.0 wont work either for the reasons I just mentioned (missing cuda instructions in that architecture).
Unfortunately this is an irreversible decision. We're sorry that we are not able to support Tesla K10 owners.

body:
@RichGit101 thanks for your comment.
Deprecating cuda capability 3.0 is more than for binary size. 3.0 misses some cuda instructions that we heavily rely on, for example `__shfl`.
Compiling PyTorch from source for CC3.0 wont work either for the reasons I just mentioned (missing cuda instructions in that architecture).
Unfortunately this is an irreversible decision. We're sorry that we are not able to support Tesla K10 owners.
